TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed DataLossMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: This enum is passed to the DataLoss testability API to indicate what type of data loss to induce.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.DataLossMode FullDataLoss = int32(2)

Docs.summary: FullDataLoss option will drop all the replicas which means that all the data will be lost.
Docs.remarks: This option is very useful to test out backup and recovery data paths.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.DataLossMode Invalid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Reserved. Do not pass into API.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Fabric.DataLossMode PartialDataLoss = int32(1)

Docs.summary: PartialDataLoss option will cause a quorum of replicas to go down, triggering an OnDataLoss event in the system for the given partition.
Docs.remarks: Whether actual data loss happens depends on whether there were committed transactions that were still being replicated at the time the data loss was induced
